dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.campaign.MarketingCampaign
dataStructure.description:
A depiction of how the launch or re-launch of a ProductOffering is or will be undertaken.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: MarketingCampaign

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the MarketingCampaign.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which a MarketingCampaign is known and distinguished from other MarketingCampaigns.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains what the MarketingCampaign is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: mcType
child.description:
A categorization of a MarketingCampaign, such as new or re-launch.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: mcType

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period during which the MarketingCampaign is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
